test.description: Indicate below the content of the test. This must have the output format of the tests generated with the questionnaire generator:
test.formatDescription: or any other tool that follows the

help.title: Question Format
help.line1: Each question consists of three parts: Title, Possible Answers, Correct Answer Number.
help.line2:
```

1. Question title  
   Possible answer 1  
   Possible answer 2  
   ... 
Respuesta correcta: X  
  
```
help.line4:
```

1. What color is the sky?  
   Blue  
   Black  
   It depends on whether it is day or night  
   None of the above  
Respuesta correcta: 3  
  
```
help.line7: - The format of the question is [number][dot][space]Question
help.line8: - The text for the answer line must explicitly be **Respuesta correcta: X**
help.line9: - where X is the solution based on its position. In this example, **3** is _"It depends on whether it is day or night"_
